Goals: GSVA for the individual time points and the hallmarks to see the variance within the biological replicates

```{r}
library("GSVA")
```


```{r}
library(readr)
counts <- read.csv("~/Documents/Mythreye_Lab/anoikis/CAOV3/results/counts_CAOV3.csv")
View(counts)
```

```{r}
no_decimals <- gsub('\\.[0-9]*$','',counts$X)
colnames(counts) <- c("X", "P0A", "P0B", "P0C","P1A", "P1B", "P1C", "P6A", "P6B", "P6C", "P7A", "P7B", "P7C")
#now we are going to add this to the df 
counts$X <- no_decimals
counts <- counts[, 2:13]
rownames(counts) <- no_decimals
```

```{r}
counts2 <- as.matrix(counts)
```


#this is for the gene list that we are wanting for the Immune Signatures 
#same as from ClusterProfiler
```{r}
library("msigdbr")
library(enrichplot)
# we use ggplot2 to add x axis labels (ex: ridgeplot)
library(ggplot2)
library(cowplot)
# SET THE DESIRED ORGANISM HERE
organism = "org.Hs.eg.db"
#BiocManager::install(organism, character.only = TRUE)
library(organism, character.only = TRUE)
```

```{r echo=FALSE, message= FALSE, warning= FALSE}
#to get the gene set that we want
#in this particular setting we want the H genes, which are Hallmark genes 
h_gene_sets = msigdbr(species = "Homo sapiens", category = "H")
m_t2g <- msigdbr(species = "Homo sapiens", category = "H") %>% 
  dplyr::select(gs_name, ensembl_gene, human_entrez_gene)
```

```{r}
msigdbr_list = split(x = h_gene_sets$ensembl_gene, f = h_gene_sets$gs_name)
```

#running GSVA
```{r}
gsva.es <- gsva(counts2, msigdbr_list, method= "gsva", verbose=TRUE)
```

```{r}
write.csv(gsva.es, "~/Desktop/CAOV3_Hallmarls_res.csv")
```

#heatmap to show the scores 
```{r}
data <- gsva.es
```

```{r}
library(RColorBrewer)
coul <- brewer.pal(13, "RdBu") 
coul2 <- coul + scale_color_brewer(direction = -1)
heatmap(data, Colv= NA, col= coul2, cexRow= .4) 
```

```{r}
library(ComplexHeatmap)
Heatmap(data, col = coul2, cluster_columns = FALSE, row_names_gp = gpar(fontsize = 4))
```

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
```

```{r}
data2 <- data[ c(7, 36) , ]
data3 <- t(data2)
rownames(data3) <- colnames(data2)
data_3 <- as.data.frame(data3)
```

```{r}
Group_values <- rep(c("P0","P1", "P6","P7"),each=3)
```

```{r}
data_3$Group <- Group_values
```

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
p <- ggplot(data_3, aes(HALLMARK_APOPTOSIS, HALLMARK_OXIDATIVE_PHOSPHORYLATION, colour= Group)) + theme(panel.background = element_blank(), panel.grid.major= element_line()) + theme(axis.line = element_line(colour = "black")) + theme(legend.key.size = unit(1, 'cm'), legend.text = element_text(size=10), legend.title=element_blank()) + guides(color=guide_legend(ncol=2))
p + geom_point()
ggsave("~/Desktop/CAOV3_APOP_OXPHOS_Hallmarks_Comparison.tiff", plot = last_plot())
```
